Detailed Description

A texture struct

Field Documentation

void* pgeTexture::palette

Image palette.

enum pgePixelFormat pgeTexture::palFormat

Palette format - one of PGE_PIXEL_FORMAT_5650, PGE_PIXEL_FORMAT_5551, PGE_PIXEL_FORMAT_4444, PGE_PIXEL_FORMAT_8888.

void* pgeTexture::data

Image data.

unsigned int pgeTexture::size

Size of data in bytes.

unsigned int pgeTexture::width

Image width.

unsigned int pgeTexture::height

Image height.

unsigned int pgeTexture::textureWidth

Texture width (power of two).

unsigned int pgeTexture::textureHeight

Texture height (power of two).

unsigned int pgeTexture::bits

Image bits per pixel.

enum pgePixelFormat pgeTexture::format

Image format - one of pgePixelFormat.

char pgeTexture::swizzled

Is image swizzled.

enum pgeMemoryLocation pgeTexture::location

One of pgeMemoryLocation.
